# AI Ready PDX - Complete Site Content

> AI Ready PDX is Portland's AI consulting partner for small business. Powered by Vital Enterprises' 30+ years of technology leadership, we help Portland-area businesses adopt AI confidently, practically, and securely.

## Company Overview

AI Ready PDX is part of the Vital Enterprises family in the Pacific Northwest. Our companies include VTM, which has led global technology consortiums for over 30 years, and Novus Labs, which has spent 17 years working on complex consumer electronics products for leading brands like Amazon, Google, Microsoft, and Oculus.

We help mostly non-technical small and mid-sized organizations in the Portland metro and Pacific Northwest adopt AI safely and practically. AI has moved from bleeding edge to business essential, and we help local organizations get ready.

### Core Values
- Calm, competent, grounded - not hype-driven
- Plain language, practical outcomes
- People and culture come first - we empower your team, not replace them
- Privacy-first options available

## Why Work With AI Ready PDX

### Decades of Tech Leadership
AI Ready PDX is part of the Vital Enterprises family. Our companies include VTM, which has led global technology consortiums for over 30 years, and Novus Labs, which has spent 17 years working on complex consumer electronics products.

### We Know Tech and Business
We understand how companies actually run: how work gets scheduled, how revenue flows, and where things get stuck. We translate AI into process improvements, not buzzwords.

### We're Already Doing This
We've been working with AI-enabled products and tools for several years and are already helping organizations in the region design and implement AI strategies.

### People and Culture Come First
We empower your team to do more and create more value with AI, not replace them. Our goal is expanding capabilities while respecting your culture.

## Services

### Marketing & Sales
- **Web presence (SEO, AEO, GEO)**: AI-assisted website optimization for search engines and AI answer engines
- **Content & collateral**: AI-powered content creation and marketing materials
- **Outreach (email, voice, social)**: Ethical cold outreach and communication systems

### Operations
- **Scheduling & intake**: Smarter lead intake and follow-up workflows
- **Inventory & supply chain**: AI-powered visibility into orders and inventory
- **Process automation**: Internal tools and workflow automation using agentic coding

### Management
- **Dashboards & analytics**: AI-powered business intelligence
- **Reporting & insights**: Automated reporting and trend analysis

### Confidential AI
- **On-premise deployment**: Local AI inference boxes installed on your network
- **Private cloud inference**: Locked-down Azure and AWS environments with private networking

## Industries We Serve

### Field Services
HVAC, Plumbing, Landscaping, Tree Services - Improve scheduling, quoting, and follow-up

### Retail & Hospitality
Coffee, Restaurants, Shops - Better customer communication and web presence

### Professional
Dental, Legal, Accounting - Streamline intake, reminders, and client communication with privacy-first options

### Civic & Education
Schools, Churches, Public Safety - Do more with limited staff while protecting sensitive data

### Manufacturing
Machinery, Fabrication, Assembly - Better visibility into orders, inventory, and customer needs

## Pricing

### AI Readiness Session - $50 (90% off for first 100 clients)
- 60-90 minute consultation
- Custom recommendations based on your business
- AI Opportunities Snapshot document with 3-5 specific ideas and rough ROI
- Recommendation on whether on-prem, cloud, or simple SaaS tools make sense

### AI Training & Quick Wins - $1,500/quarter
- 90 minute training (1 session or 2x 45-min)
- Website & web presence review
- One "quick win" deliverable per quarter
- Email support between sessions

### AI Deep Dive - $2,500 one-time (Most Popular)
- 2 hours: Deep dive into your business
- 2 hours: Recommendations presentation
- Written roadmap/deliverable
- Includes 90-minute training session
- Execute yourself or engage us for projects

### Execution & Projects - Custom Pricing
- **Marketing Services**: Content, posting, analytics, and branding
- **Custom Solutions**: AI applications and integrations
- **AI Kickstart Sprint**: Roadmap + first pilot
- **On-Premise AI**: Air-gapped deployment for sensitive data

## Our Approach

### Phase 1: Assess
- AI Readiness Assessment
- Website AI Audit (SEO, AEO, GEO)
- Opportunity identification
- Technology stack review
- Privacy & security evaluation

### Phase 2: Train
- Executive AI briefings
- Team training sessions
- Agentic coding tools
- Ongoing strategy support
- Quarterly State of AI updates

### Phase 3: Implement
- Chatbots & voice agents
- Content automation tools
- Cold outreach systems
- Custom AI applications
- Secure on-premise AI

## Confidential AI Solutions

For organizations with sensitive data (legal, medical, financial, or proprietary), we offer on-premise and air-gapped solutions where your data never leaves your building.

### Benefits
- Your data never leaves your machine
- Owning vs renting intelligence
- Predictable costs (CapEx vs unpredictable token bills)
- Regulatory and compliance benefits for law, medical, and finance clients

## Frequently Asked Questions

### Who is AI Ready PDX?
AI Ready PDX is part of Vital Enterprises, with 30+ years leading global technology consortiums and 17 years building complex products for leading brands. We help Portland-area businesses and nonprofits adopt AI practically - projects that ship in weeks, clear explanations of what AI can do, and a pace that respects your culture.

### What kinds of businesses do you work with?
We work primarily with small to mid-sized businesses and nonprofits in the Portland metro and Pacific Northwest. Our clients include home service companies, coffee roasters, professional practices like dental and legal offices, small manufacturers, and community organizations.

### Do you offer on-premise AI solutions?
Yes. For organizations with strict data privacy or compliance requirements, we can deploy local AI appliances on your network. Your data never leaves your building, and you get the same capabilities as cloud AI without the privacy concerns.

### What does an AI Readiness Session cover?
In our 60-90 minute session (just $50 for the first 100 clients), we review how your organization runs today, identify 3-5 specific AI opportunities with rough ROI estimates, recommend whether on-premise, cloud, or simple SaaS tools make sense for you, and provide a written AI Opportunities Snapshot you can share with your team.

### Is AI safe for sensitive data like legal or medical records?
It can be, with the right setup. We offer both on-premise solutions where data never leaves your network, and locked-down cloud environments with private networking. We also train your team on what's safe to use AI for and what should stay in your core systems.

---

## Service Page: AI Consulting & Strategy

URL: https://aireadypdx.com/services/ai-consulting

AI Ready PDX helps Portland-area companies assess their AI readiness, develop strategic roadmaps, and identify opportunities for growth.

### AI Consulting Services

**AI Readiness Assessment**
Comprehensive evaluation of your current operations, technology stack, and team capabilities to determine where AI can make the biggest impact.
- 60-90 minute deep-dive consultation
- 3-5 specific AI opportunities identified
- ROI estimates for each opportunity
- Written AI Opportunities Snapshot

**Strategy and Roadmaps**
Custom AI implementation plans aligned with your business goals, budget, and timeline. Clear milestones with measurable outcomes.
- Prioritized implementation plan
- Technology recommendations
- Budget and resource planning
- Risk assessment and mitigation

**Opportunity Identification**
Discover hidden efficiency gains and competitive advantages in your business processes through AI analysis.
- Process efficiency analysis
- Automation potential mapping
- Competitive landscape review
- Quick win identification

### Why AI Consulting Matters

- 30+ Years of Technology Leadership: Powered by Vital Enterprises with enterprise experience serving 50+ major clients
- Business-First Approach: AI can reduce administrative overhead by up to 40% for most small businesses
- Proven Track Record: 73% of businesses plan to increase AI investment in 2025
- Empower, Not Replace: Clients typically save 10+ hours per week while keeping their team engaged

### AI Consulting Process

1. **Assess**: Comprehensive AI Readiness Assessment to understand your business and identify opportunities
2. **Strategize**: Custom roadmap with prioritized initiatives and clear milestones
3. **Implement**: Training, ongoing support, and hands-on assistance for successful adoption

---

## Service Page: Workflow Automation

URL: https://aireadypdx.com/services/workflow-automation

AI Ready PDX helps Portland-area businesses save 10+ hours per week through intelligent chatbots, voice agents, and process automation.

### Workflow Automation Services

**Chatbots and Voice Agents**
AI-powered conversational interfaces for customer support, appointment booking, and FAQ handling that work 24/7.
- 24/7 customer response
- Appointment scheduling
- Lead qualification
- Multi-language support

**Process Automation**
Intelligent automation for repetitive business processes, reducing manual work and eliminating human errors.
- Scheduling and intake automation
- Invoice processing
- Data entry automation
- Workflow triggers

**Outreach Automation**
Automated email, voice, and social media outreach to engage customers and generate leads consistently.
- Email campaign automation
- Voice agent follow-ups
- Social media scheduling
- Lead nurturing sequences

### Benefits of Workflow Automation

- Save 10+ Hours Per Week: Automate routine tasks so your team focuses on high-value work
- 24/7 Customer Response: AI handles inquiries around the clock, never missing a lead
- Reduce Human Error: Automated workflows execute consistently without manual mistakes
- Scale Without Hiring: Handle more customers without adding staff

### Industry Automation Use Cases

- **Field Services**: Automated scheduling, quote follow-ups, and service reminders
- **Professional Practices**: Patient/client intake, appointment reminders, document requests
- **Retail and Hospitality**: Order confirmations, reservation management, feedback collection

---

## Service Page: Employee Training

URL: https://aireadypdx.com/services/employee-training

AI Ready PDX offers executive briefings, hands-on training, and ongoing support to help Portland-area organizations adopt AI confidently and safely.

### AI Training Programs

**Executive AI Briefings**
Strategic overviews for leadership teams covering AI opportunities, risks, and decision frameworks for your industry.
- 90-minute executive session
- Industry-specific AI landscape
- Investment and ROI guidance
- Competitive positioning insights

**Team Training Sessions**
Practical, hands-on AI training for your staff, covering tools they can use immediately in their daily work.
- Role-based curriculum
- Live tool demonstrations
- Practice exercises
- Recorded sessions for reference

**Agentic Coding Tools**
Training for developers and technical staff on using AI-powered coding assistants and automation tools safely.
- Claude, Copilot, and Cursor training
- Code review best practices
- Security and privacy guidelines
- Productivity optimization

### Training Philosophy

- **People-First Approach**: AI augments your team's capabilities - it doesn't replace them
- **Practical, Not Theoretical**: Every session includes hands-on exercises with tools you'll actually use
- **Safety and Privacy First**: Clear guidelines on what's safe to share with AI tools
- **Ongoing Support**: Quarterly State of AI updates and email support

### Training Delivery Options

1. **On-Site Training**: Hands-on sessions at your Portland-area location
2. **Remote Sessions**: Live video training with full interactivity
3. **Recorded Library**: All sessions recorded for future reference and new team members

---

## Service Page: Confidential AI

URL: https://aireadypdx.com/services/confidential-ai

For organizations with strict data privacy requirements, AI Ready PDX deploys AI solutions where your data never leaves your building.

### Deployment Options

**On-Premise AI Appliances**
Dedicated AI hardware installed in your facility with complete network isolation.
- Hardware installed on-site
- Complete network isolation
- No external data transmission
- Full administrative control

**Private Cloud Inference**
Dedicated cloud instances with private networking and enterprise-grade security.
- Isolated cloud environment
- Private VPN connectivity
- SOC 2 compliant hosting
- Encrypted data at rest

**Air-Gapped Solutions**
Completely disconnected systems for maximum security in classified or highly regulated environments.
- Zero internet connectivity
- Physical security integration
- Offline model updates
- Audit-ready documentation

### Why Choose On-Premise AI

- **Your Data Never Leaves Your Building**: No cloud transmission means no exposure risk
- **Own Your Intelligence, Don't Rent It**: Build proprietary AI models that become competitive assets
- **Predictable Costs**: Capital expenditure instead of unpredictable token-based billing
- **Regulatory Compliance Ready**: Meet HIPAA, legal ethics rules, financial regulations

### Industries Served

- **Legal**: Attorney-client privilege protection, document analysis, research automation
- **Medical**: HIPAA-compliant clinical documentation, scheduling, administrative tasks
- **Financial**: Client data protection, SEC/FINRA/banking regulation compliance
- **Manufacturing**: Proprietary process protection, quality control, predictive maintenance

### Enterprise Security Features

- End-to-end encryption for all data
- Role-based access controls
- Complete audit logging
- Regular security updates and patching
- Compliance documentation packages
- Staff training on secure AI usage

---

## About Page

URL: https://aireadypdx.com/about

AI Ready PDX is a Portland-based AI consulting firm helping local businesses and nonprofits adopt artificial intelligence practically.

### Our Story

AI Ready PDX is part of Vital Enterprises, a company with 30+ years of proven technology leadership. We have served 50+ enterprise clients across the technology sector through our family of companies.

Our portfolio includes VTM Group, which has led global technology consortiums for over 30 years, and Novus Labs, with 17 years of experience building complex consumer electronics products for leading brands including Amazon, Google, and Microsoft.

With this foundation of enterprise-level expertise, we created AI Ready PDX to bring the same caliber of technology leadership to Portland-area businesses and nonprofits.

### Our Values

**People-First**
AI augments human work, creating more value from your existing staff. Clients typically report saving 10+ hours per week while keeping their team engaged and productive.

**Practical**
We translate AI into practical process improvements, not buzzwords. AI can reduce administrative overhead by up to 40% for most small businesses.

**Privacy-Focused**
Your data never leaves your building with our on-premise solutions. For organizations with strict compliance requirements, we deploy local AI appliances on your network.

### Frequently Asked Questions

**Who is AI Ready PDX?**
AI Ready PDX is part of Vital Enterprises, with 30+ years leading global technology consortiums and 17 years building complex products for leading brands. We've served 50+ enterprise clients and now help Portland-area businesses adopt AI practically.

**What kinds of businesses do you work with?**
We work primarily with small to mid-sized businesses (5-100 employees) and nonprofits across the Portland metro area. Over 80% of our clients are first-time AI adopters.

**Do you offer on-premise AI solutions?**
Yes. For organizations with strict data privacy requirements, we can deploy local AI appliances on your network where your data never leaves your building.

**What does an AI Readiness Session cover?**
In our 60-90 minute session ($50 for first 100 clients), we identify 3-5 specific AI opportunities with ROI estimates and provide a written AI Opportunities Snapshot. Clients typically identify $10,000-50,000 in annual savings opportunities.

**Is AI safe for sensitive data?**
It can be, with the right setup. We offer on-premise solutions where data never leaves your network, and locked-down cloud environments with private networking.
